title: Heart of a Bear
description: A Hot Paranormal Werebear Romance  Gillian and her girlfriend Margot have finally saved up enough money to go to Iceland. It’s in the middle of winter, but that’s when the prices are the lowest. They’ve always been fascinated by what they have seen about the culture. They arrive on an early morning flight and they are greeted by Johan, who takes an instant liking to both girls. They find him attractive, quiet and mysterious, but what they don’t know is that he hides an interesting secret that is going to change both of their lives. Can they get over and past what he is and see what’s underneath all of it?  ••• This is a standalone erotic fiction story, no cliffhanger •••   FREE BONUS SERIES INSIDE   *This book contains mature themes and language. Only suitable for ages 18+
author: Anna Collins
